New Records: Tabraiz Shamsi became the Player of the Match with 4 wickets for 60 runs.
Marco Jansen scored 160.22 match impact points.
Saud Shakeel scored the highest score of 52 off 50 balls.
Key Match Events: Concussion sub: Usama Mir in for Shadab Khan during South Africa's innings
Several reviews and decisions during the match, including Babar Azam's wicket and Tabraiz Shamsi's dismissal
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan elected to bat first after winning the toss
The match was a day-night encounter in Chennai
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa won the match by 1 wicket with 16 balls remaining
South Africa secured 2 points, Pakistan 0 in the series
Pakistan's innings breakdown led to their defeat
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the 26th of the World Cup
DRS umpires Alex Wharf and Paul Reiffel were involved
Player substitutions, including concussion sub, were notable
